Text:
It's for WBFS formated Discs like Harddrives and USB Sticks.

So if you want to use your harddrive (an external one of yourse:P) or USB Stick for something else than wii games too, then don't format it WBFS

If you invest the 20 bucks on a 16 or even 32 GB storage media, then format it properly, there is no way to enjoy pirated games any better
just make partitions thats what i done, one for films and music, one for wii apps and emulators like snes9x and a WBFS partition just for games.
Hi can i please for 32bit version WBFSManager3.0.1-RTW? This one dosn't work for me... :(
